mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.name, su.welcomes, su.logo_url, su.ext_flag, sm.busi_id AS bType, sm.busi_supplier_id as busiSupplierId, su.create_time as createDate FROM supplier su, busi_supplier_mapping sm WHERE su.id = sm.supplier_id and su.status=1 and sm.status = 1 and sm.busi_id=#{busiId} and sm.busi_supplier_id=#{busiSupplierId}

select DISTINCT busi_supplier_mapping.busi_supplier_id from supplier,busi_supplier_mapping where supplier.id=busi_supplier_mapping.supplier_id and supplier.status=1 and busi_supplier_mapping.busi_id=#{busiId} and busi_supplier_mapping.status=1 and busi_supplier_mapping.busi_supplier_id in
#{busiSupplierId}

SELECT array_agg(distinct su.id) FROM supplier su, busi_supplier_mapping sm WHERE su.id = sm.supplier_id and su.status=1 and sm.status = 1 and sm.busi_id in
#{busiId}
